title: Live from San Fran 2015
description:
James Adomian, Leo Allen, Janine Brito, Dominic Dierkes and DC Pierson share stories about times things got a bit too intense.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Allison, Lucas Perný and Miloslav Kollar, Dominic Dierkes, DC Pierson, Janine Brito, James Adomian, Leo Allen, Mike Farris)
